item.description:
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming!
We usually provide handouts and have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up.
*********************************************

As practice-tioners of Law Of Attraction, we know how important it is to have a consistent practice, keeping our thoughts and emotions in a happier, higher vibrational place, so that we attract more of what we want.

However, these days, even the most "disciplined" of us might be getting drained mentally and emotionally, given the current economic climate where we are "bombarded" by other people’s fearful emotions, anxiety and loss of hope. On top of this, some of us also have to deal with personal fears and concerns too (e.g. experiencing job and/or financial loss).

This sense of frustration, fear and/or disempowerment causes loss of energy. This drain can make it challenging to remain in a happier, joyful place day in and day out.

Based on her system of Energy Restructuring, Yuliya Cohen, energy healer and BostonLOA member, will share with us some simple and powerful ways that quickly and efficiently connect you to the Universal power contained within your own body so that you can...

- disengage immediately from negative thoughts and emotions in the moment they are happening,
by taking back all the energy lost to negative thoughts and emotions in areas of your life like health, relationships, financial, job/business or spirituality,

- strengthen your personal “good vibe space ” to ward off negative vibes,

and the Best Part! – You don't have to be in control of the process – The Universe will do it for you.


By enhancing your LOA practice with these powerful tools of Energy Restructuring, you can get yourself to a more hopeful and energetically empowering "inner" place that allows you to deal more effectively with the "outer" realities of a world that's fear-based.

The added bonus is that you can get to this better place faster without requiring extensive 'digging' into underlying problems and beliefs.


Join us, volunteer to get some "mini-coaching" with Yuliya where she demonstrates how to use the Energy Restructuring tools that will guide you to a place of empowerment and authentic wholeness.

*********************************************************************************
About Yuliya Cohen:
www.yuliyacohen.com
Brookline, MA

Yuliya is a trained energy healer, medical intuitive and therapist, and the creator of the Energy Restructuring™ System. She received her training from the HLCC "Crucible" program, directed by Rev. Rosalyn Bruyere, a world-renowned healer, scholar & researcher in the field of Energy Healing.

Yuliya was formerly an engineer & computer science researcher (including work at Siemens Research and Technology Laboratories) and holds degrees in Civil Engineering from the Kiev School of Civil Engineering & in Computer Science from Brandeis University.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA Meetup - IN PERSON, 7 - 9 pm
